Hi

if its the guy fomr polan keep well clear its a scam

the sword forum are aware of him and have discussed

paul


--- Lilith <lillith.saintcrow@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
Hey, did anyone else receive a solicitation for a $400
"Japanese
sword"? I wondered if perhaps someone in the groups
thought I would
be interested, and I'm not. (I already have my blade.)
If, however,
this is spam, I will be trashing the mail to my
bitbin.

Lili

messages.subject: Off-subject
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, did anyone else receive a solicitation for a $400 Japanese sword ? I wondered if perhaps someone in the groups thought I would be interested, and I m
messages.messageBody:
Hey, did anyone else receive a solicitation for a $400 "Japanese
sword"? I wondered if perhaps someone in the groups thought I would
be interested, and I'm not. (I already have my blade.) If, however,
this is spam, I will be trashing the mail to my bitbin.

Lili
